regex.name: get=URL
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re import requests import urllib2 url = 'https://pastebin.com/raw/UBwewVGR' source = requests.get(url) jsontoken = re.findall('perth":"(.*?)"', source.text)[0] token = jsontoken.replace('http://','https://') return token

regex.name: token
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data, Cookie_Jar, m): import requests import re session = requests.session() headers = {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPad; CPU OS 6_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/536.26 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/6.0 Mobile/10A5376e Safari/8536.25", "Referer": "http://www.tonton.com.my/login", "Connection": "keep-alive"} r = session.get('http://www.tonton.com.my/vindicia/playerOTP?id=J3ZmNmeDpV1EMWlR6YJU_YDCqKbh_bSg', headers=headers) token = re.findall(r'"token":"(.*?)"', r.text)[0].replace('\/', '/') r = session.get(token, headers=headers) headers = {'Referer': 'http://player.ooyala.com/static/cacheable/a749e376b1fadc6784b96bd76a37692d/player_v2.swf?player=dde0012b6dcc4dc7b26306bdaff0dce2', 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (iPad; CPU OS 6_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/536.26 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/6.0 Mobile/10A5376e Safari/8536.25'} r = session.get('http://player.ooyala.com/sas/akamai_edge_auth_token?embed_code=J3ZmNmeDpV1EMWlR6YJU_YDCqKbh_bSg&video_pcode=owMjgyOkSbJagb4ozVY_03UrHYLt', headers=headers) return r.text

regex.name: token
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re import requests
url = 'http://iview.abc.net.au/auth/flash/' source = requests.get(url) m3u8 = re.findall('tokenhd>(.*?)</tokenhd', source.text)[0] return m3u8

item.title: abc2
item.link: plugin://plugin.video.f4mTester/?streamtype=HLS&url=https://abctvlivehls-lh.akamaihd.net/i/abc1_1@360323/master.m3u8?hdnea=$doregex[token]&pvswf=http://iview.abc.net.au/assets/swf/cineramaWrapper_Acc_018.swf?version=0.2|X-Forwarded-For=101.175.18.124&User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (iPad; CPU OS 6_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/536.26 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/6.0 Mobile/10A5376e Safari/8536.25
